narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Oregon Trail School District is a Local Education Agency (LEA) provider based in Sandy, OR. From 2018-11 through 2023-04, this provider received $393K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 4 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.0× the national median for T1018 (T1018), at $117 per claim vs. the median of $40, placing them above the 90th percentile.
91% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: T1018 (T1018). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $13K in 2018 to $45K in 2023 (252% growth).
Saw a 13.4× spike in 2019 ($13K → $172K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
